description: Resource Type definition for AWS::Connect::Instance. Source:- https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-resource-providers-connect

InboundCalls.description: Mandatory element which enables inbound calls on new instance.
InboundCalls.title: AWSConnectInstanceInboundCallsDefinition

OutboundCalls.description: Mandatory element which enables outbound calls on new instance.
OutboundCalls.title: AWSConnectInstanceOutboundCallsDefinition

ContactflowLogs.description: Boolean flag which enables CONTACTFLOW_LOGS on an instance.
ContactflowLogs.title: AWSConnectInstanceContactflowLogsDefinition

ContactLens.description: Boolean flag which enables CONTACT_LENS on an instance.
ContactLens.title: AWSConnectInstanceContactLensDefinition

AutoResolveBestVoices.description: Boolean flag which enables AUTO_RESOLVE_BEST_VOICES on an instance.
AutoResolveBestVoices.title: AWSConnectInstanceAutoResolveBestVoicesDefinition

UseCustomTTSVoices.description: Boolean flag which enables USE_CUSTOM_TTS_VOICES on an instance.
UseCustomTTSVoices.title: AWSConnectInstanceUseCustomTTSVoicesDefinition

EarlyMedia.description: Boolean flag which enables EARLY_MEDIA on an instance.
EarlyMedia.title: AWSConnectInstanceEarlyMediaDefinition

IdentityManagementType.description: Specifies the type of directory integration for new instance.

InstanceAlias.description: Alias of the new directory created as part of new instance creation.

DirectoryId.description: Existing directoryId user wants to map to the new Connect instance.

title: AWSConnectInstanceProperties
